verses.text: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w receive|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lie|strong="H7723"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w join|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w person|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w to|strong="H1961"\w* do \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou yield \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H7451"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* opinion \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* most \w part|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w stray|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* truth.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou favour \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* man \w in|strong="H3808"\w* judgment.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w meet|strong="H6293"\w* thy enemy’s \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* ass \w going|strong="H7725"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ass \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hateth thee \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* \w underneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H2308"\w* pass \w by|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* shalt lift \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* man’s \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

Thou shalt fly \w lying|strong="H8267"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* person thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* death: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* abhor \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w blind|strong="H5786"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wise, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* pervert \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* molest \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hearts \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* shalt \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* corn thereof.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H7637"\w* thou shalt \w let|strong="H8058"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w alone|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* suffer \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H7704"\w* \w rest|strong="H3499"\w*, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* whatsoever \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w be|strong="H3754"\w* \w left|strong="H5203"\w*, \w let|strong="H8058"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* thy oliveyard.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy ass \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* swear, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H8141"\w* shall \w celebrate|strong="H2287"\w* feasts \w to|strong="H8141"\w* me.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*. \w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* corn, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou didst \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H8141"\w* thy \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, whatsoever thou hast \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w end|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H0622"\w* thy corn \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

Thrice \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w males|strong="H2138"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* corn \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* kid \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* dam.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* notice \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* think \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* contemned: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast sinned, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0340"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0340"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0340"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* afflict \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* afflict thee.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Hethite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Pherezite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, whom \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4397"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3582"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* adore \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w destroy|strong="H7665"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* statues.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w sickness|strong="H4245"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* fruitless \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

\w Sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w hornets|strong="H6880"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H7971"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thou come \w in|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0259"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cast \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7227"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w make|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w*: which undoubtedly \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* scandal \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee.
